name: Data Flow Media Systems
overview: Data Flow Media Systems, LP provides print and promotional products, services, and solutions to companies in the United States. It offers promotional products, such as sportswear, T-shirts, ball caps, embroidery, pens, key chains, coffee mugs, and jackets; commercial print products, including letterheads, envelopes, business cards, brochures, forms, cut sheets, product sheets, books, docutech manuals, directories, signs, and posters; and business forms, such as laser forms, customer computer forms, self mailers, snap-outs, tax forms, stock computer paper, fax paper, checks, and OCR/OMR forms. The company also provides binders and books; and labels/tags, including mailing/shipping labels, bar code labels, laser printable labels, thermal transfer labels, stock labels, bin labels/inventory tags, and labels for the telecommunications industry. In addition, it offers document management services, such as warehousing, inventory control, distribution, on-line access, forms activity, and reporting; as well as forms design, systems analysis, forms analysis, typesetting, electronic forms, acceptance of purchasing cards, and digital documentation services. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Plano, Texas. As of October 2007, Data Flow Media Systems, LP is a subsidiary of InnerWorkings, Inc.

acquisition.source_description: InnerWorkings, Inc. Broadens Geographic Presence with Acquisitions in Dallas and Minneapolis Markets
